### Introduction
There exist multiple _formal systems_ of logic. **Propositional logic** 
(sometimes also referred to as sentential or truth-functional logic) is one such 
_formal system_ that focuses in particular on what inferences we can make about 
_sentences_ using **logical connectives**. The other _formal systems_ of logic 
we intend to discuss are extensions of propositional logic.
